values.name: HeartCo
values.description:
HeartCo Design are a professional, affordable media solutions business based in Shoreham, Sussex.

We offer Websites, Designs, Logos, Videos and much more at prices that are extremely competitive.
Our most popular product is our affordable website design and development.

Here on HeartCo Design’s website, we will showcase all the best websites, logos, designs and projects that HeartCo Design have contributed towards all across the region of East Sussex and West Sussex. Ranging from areas like Brighton, London, Hove, Eastbourne, Worthing and of course Web Design in Shoreham (to name a few).

Rock-IT Enterprise is a Community Interest Company, Limited by Guarantee, whose partners are Albion in the Community, the registered charity of Brighton and Hove Albion FC.  Abcom a successful Sussex IT company and RML Community Partners, a Sussex based social enterprise business consultancy.

values: Refurbisher of second user IT equipment
Provision of training in IT hardware and software for 16-24 year olds not in training, education or employment.

values.name: Rock-IT Enterprise cic

values.description:
MTM Property is a market leader for Sales & Lettings in Brighton & Hove. With the largest rental portfolio and an ever expanding sales department, you can be confident in instructing us to sell or let your property.  

We work hard to match tenants and buyers to properties with a degree of tenacity that is hard to match. We are very experienced and have gained thorough knowledge through years of buying, selling and letting our own property. Our range of services is comprehensive, can be tailored to meet your needs and our rates are competitive so call us to find out why 100% of respondents in a recent survey would recommend MTM to friends and family.

Over the last couple of years our sales department has developed and expanded to accommodate a diverse range of properties, buyers and sellers. Our growth is underpinned and driven by our sheer determination to provide you, the customer, with an unrivalled personal and detailed service. We take the time to listen to you, understand your requirements and then tailor our package to meet your specific needs.

In many cases we have succeeded in agreeing sales on properties marketed by other larger agents in the area. Even in what is undeniably a challenging market, our focus on matching serious buyers to the right property has paid off, with many sellers pleasantly surprised at our ability to source a buyer for their property where others failed.
values.name: MTM Property Services Ltd

values.description:
Safety Net’s vision is to create communities across Brighton, Hove and Sussex that work together to keep children safe. We aim to ensure all children and young people are aware that they have the right to feel and be safe, and that they can get help when they need it.  We work with families,  in schools and in local communities.

Our Vision is to build safer communities for children and young people, where all children, young people and families know that they have the right to feel safe, the responsibility to keep others safe and the support to reach their full potential.

Our Mission: To work with communities to improve the safety and well-being of children, young people and families, at home, school and in their neighbourhoods.
values.name: Safety-Net Brighton

values.description: BHT is a charity that provides accommodation, support and advice to homeless, insecurely housed and vulnerable people in Brighton and Hove, Eastbourne and Hastings. Our mission is to empower  disadvantaged people to make positive changes in their lives and their community.
values.name: Brighton Housing Trust

values.description:
A state-of-the-art dental practice in central Hove offering stunning cosmetic dental treatments including teeth whitening, porcelain veneers, white fillings, gum contouring and teeth reshaping as well as clear orthodontics using "invisible" braces to create the perfect smile makeover. 

To restore your smile by replacing missing, decayed or broken teeth, we use crowns, bridges, dentures and dental implants. With the latest technology in dentistry, we're able to offer the highest quality of care with a wide option of treatments. 

Our preventive dental treatments include scale and polish, bad breath, gum disease, decay detection and mouth cancer screening services. 

We also have expertise and special interests in oral surgery for extractions, root canal therapy for infections and sedation is available for nervous patients.

Our facial rejuvation experts remove wrinkles, frowns and lines on the face to make you look and feel younger.
values.name: Bright On Smiles

values.description:
The Russell Education Trust (RET) is a not-for-profit charitable trust.  It is sponsored by Education London (EL), an educational consultancy that works in partnership with a number of outstanding schools and academies, senior inspectors, academics and education leaders to support the implementation of best practice in schools nationally. 

EL were the DfE's school improvement provider for the London Challenge and supported 22 of the 23 most improved London Schools. Through the London Challenge, and the support from EL, schools in London now lead the outcomes across England.

RET uses the experience of EL, and all their trustees and partners, to work with parents, communities, and diocesan authorities to establish and run new Free Schools.  RET Free Schools are inclusive comprehensives with the highest possible academic standards, serving their locality and working as part of their local family of schools. Both RET, and the founding groups with whom they work, are firmly resolved that RET Free Schools will all be judged to be good or outstanding by Ofsted and their communities within two years of opening. 

RET currently sponsors the following Free Schools:

   - Bristol Free School (Established Sept 2011)
   - Becket Keys Church of England School (Established Sept 2012)
   - St Andrew the Apostle Greek Orthodox School (Due to open Sept 2013)
   - King's School Hove (Due to open Sept 2013)
   - Turing House School (Due to open Sept 2014)
values.name: Russell Education Trust

values.description:
From our offices in the city of Brighton & Hove our experienced and friendly team advise clients worldwide on tax and financial issues. 

Our business revolves around relationships as much as numbers. We take time to understand the requirements of our clients and their businesses to ensure we deliver effective advice.
values.name: McPhersons Walpole Harding

values.description:
Pageturner provides creative photographic solutions for:

Portraits, Weddings, Commercial, Events or Business Photos for Google,

Make it a Pageturner!

Pageturner Photography based in Hove, East Sussex, is run by Business owner, Photographer and
Digital artist Mike Page who will shoot and edit your photography from start to finish.

" I aim to ensure all my clients needs are met.
I'm passionate about photography, and whatever the subject is my goal is to capture
the right photography for you, professionally and with amazing results."

Owner and Photographer
Mike Page
values.name: Pageturner Photography

values.description:
GIRAFFE Magazine is a new monthly mini-mag based and distributed in Brighton.
Our magazine is written by local comedians and features interviews, artwork and articles.
We also provide comedy listings for Brighton & Hove.

GIRAFFE promotes Brighton comedians and local businesses. 
Ad space is available at great rates. 
Here are some reasons to advertise with us:

GIRAFFE is Brighton’s only FREE Stand-up comedy magazine
GIRAFFE is distributed throughout the whole of Brighton 
GIRAFFE has an estimated readership of 40,000 every month!
GIRAFFE is written and produced by local comedians and supports local comedy
GIRAFFE offers a discount for multiple month advertising space
GIRAFFE offers free inclusion in the online version of our magazine
GIRAFFE can provide a Design Service for your advertisement
GIRAFFE has a broad and diverse readership with an age range of 18-59
GIRAFFE is a reliable source of full monthly comedy listings
GIRAFFE is currently offering a special introductory price

A press pack is available on request.
Contact us for more details:
advertising@giraffemag.co.uk
values.name: GIRAFFE Magazine

values.description:
Trendco are the UK's number 1 wig and hairpiece specialists. With over 45 years experience in the industry, we have hundreds of styles and colours to suit something for everyone. We have five salons nationwide, Birmingham, Hove, London, Manchester and Nottingham as well as having a mail order service and also have stockists nationwide. 

Trendco are part of the global Aderans Company. We are continually on the look out for new innovations in the world of hair loss and wigs and have a fantastic techinal team constantally testing new products which come to the market.

values: UK's NO1 wig and hairpiece suppliers

values.name: Trend Hair Supplies

values.description:
Enliven Massage Therapy provides a complete fully mobile massage treatment service in the Brighton & Hove and Worthing areas.

Enliven is committed to enhancing your health and wellbeing through our holistic form of massage. Based in Brighton, we are a mobile company able to bring our massage couch or massage chair to any event, convention, place of work or in the comfort of your own home.

At Enliven we are fully qualified, insured and CRB checked massage practioners, who are dedicated to delivering a highly effective, timely and affordable massage experience that fits into your busy schedule.

Many people regard massage as an indulgent treat, but denying yourself the pleasure of a good rubdown means you`ll be missing out on a hugely beneficial and scientifically proven health tonic. Researchers have discovered that massage helps repair muscle and reduce inflammation after exercise, they also concluded the pain relieving benefit of massage may be comparable to the anaesthetic effects of anti-inflammatory medicine. Other health benefits include fast stress relief, lower back pain beater and boosted immunity to name but a few.

Enliven can provide either specific sports / remedial massage required for a particular problem, or a relaxing and rejuvenating holistic / swedish full body massage to stimulate and calm the body.
values.name: Enliven Massage Therapy

values.description:
Enliven Personal Training provides one to one or group personal fitness training in Brighton & Hove and Worthing areas.

Enliven provides the very latest exercises and training techniques the industry has to offer, and we also give nutritional advice and guidance throughout the course of personal training, to further improve your overall health which will aid in your success towards achieving your fitness goals.

Whatever your age and whatever your current level of fitness, we can provide the personal training you need either at a local gym, at your home or outside, perhaps in a nearby park, whatever suits you best, which can make your unique sessions fun, enjoyable, effective and challenging.

At Enliven, we understand most people consider exercise a `chore` and consequently find it boring and give up, however, we are very experienced at dealing with these very common problems and this reflects in our training practices, by encouraging clients rather than intimidating them, by offering an unique and individual approach which is a different and fresh approach to improving your health and fitness, no two clients have the same training programme.

Whether you need a few sessions to get you going or you need long and continued support,  using Enliven is a fantastic investment for your long term health and fitness.
values.name: Enliven Personal Training
Atkinsons Accountants
values.description:
Atkinsons provide trusted accounting services in Brighton & Hove, London and throughout the south east. We have done so since 1962. 

We specialise in tax solutions both for individuals and companies; business growth (providing outsourced business support); sourcing finance; and remuneration structures. We also maintain traditional accounting and auditing services.

Our clients come from a wide cross-section of business sectors, but require similar solutions; we recognise your need for professional, independent advice from your accountant, adding value to your businesses, and we recognise the benefits to you of a trusted long-term relationship with your accountant.

values.name: IT First Limited
values.description: Formerly known as Technical Response Team, we launched in 1996 with the aim of delivering IT services concentrating mainly on the small to medium size business community. Since the launch Technical Response rapidly became a market leader in their field, focusing on high levels of service backed by a Management team having over many years combined experience.From July 2008 we became known as IT First in order to reflect our expanding portfolio of services as we entered into a sponsorship agreement with Brighton & Hove Albion FC – to become the clubs shirt sponsor.Our success has grown through developing relationships with clients, by listening to their needs and developing a strategic partnership providing ongoing support either onsite or by our help desk. Our aim is to become the source for all our clients needs whether it is a piece of hardware or a fully managed global network.Looking to the future, IT First's goal is for continued growth, maintaining our unrivaled quality of service whilst embracing and presenting new technology to our clients.

We are a visual design & communication studio, based in Hove, East Sussex, providing elegant & ethical solutions for your creative needs.  At Oxide we pride ourselves on our passion for design and our strong commitment to working ethically and sustainably with our clients.  We strive to use ecological, environmentally friendly materials and processes; source from ethical suppliers who think like we do; and hope to stimulate change and support your drive to more sustainable work practices.
values.name: Oxide Creative Support

values.description:
He-Van are a fun team hence the He-Man Pun! However as a company, we are firm believers that removals, collection and delivery services should be carried out in a professional way with high standards and respect to property and people, hence that’s why were good at what we do. I believe that our can-do attitude and hard working approach truly sets us apart from most of our competitors.
 
He Van is more than the average man and van service and more than a Brighton removals firm. We are a professional team with commitment to the customer experience at an affordable price within everyone’s reach. We also take pride in supporting community events in Brighton such as the Brighton and Hove food and drink festival. More collaborations are set for 2013.  

He-Van, Movers of the Universe now offer cheap storage facilities in the heart of Brighton and can provide a complete packing and unpacking service. Furthermore we can now offer a removals service for bedsits and flats to large houses and offices. He-Van has teamed up with one of the UK's largest removal firms based in Brighton and have access to rigid 12 meter lorries. See the website for full details and services that are offered at www.he-vanandman.co.uk
 
My team and I hope that you feel confident with our service and welcome your feedback at any time. If you require a visit to your property to ascertain your moving needs, drop us a line and we’ll arrange a convenient time for your free quote.
values.name: HeVanRemovals

values.description:
Centurion Group is an active property firm encompassing all areas of the real estate industry, serving it's own portfolio holdings, whilst also providing services and ongoing advice to retained UK and international clients.

The group is Brighton based and owns The Brighton Square Portfolio, in addition to various other property assets within the city of Brighton & Hove and the South-East of England. The team is engaged in strategic advice and consultancy for clients, particularly in regard to Asset Management, Project Management, Acquisition & Disposal and Development & Investment matters. Centurion also operates in North America, with offices in Vancouver (BC), Canada.
values.name: Centurion Group.

values.description:
We are an experienced & friendly team of Chartered Surveyors and Energy Assessors with excellent knowledge of property & market conditions in the City of Brighton & Hove, throughout East & West Sussex and beyond.

Our Services include Building Surveys; HomeBuyer Reports; Defect diagnosis; Valuations for Mortgage, Right To Buy Purchase, Probate, Tax, Matrimonial, Sale/Purchase and Development Appraisals as well as Leasehold Enfranchisement valuations and advice.

We can also be involved in Lease renewal & rent review, Schedules of Dilapidations and Schedules of Condition for commercial properties (Highly recommended if your business is taking a new lease on premises).

Finally we also provide Energy Performance Certificates on commercial properties as well as Party Wall advice.
values.name: Sussex Surveyors LLP

values.description:
Producers of Hand Crafted Traditional Oak Flooring.

We Produce Hand Finished, aged, scraped and distressed authentic Wide Plank Oak Floorboards, tailor made in our workshop and finished with a unique range of colours and wood floor oils.

We deliver wood flooring throughout Brighton & Hove, Sussex, Surrey, Kent, London, Uk, Ireland and Continental Europe.

Naked Floors works closely with the wood flooring trade, builders, developers, architects, interior designers and the general public.

values: Handscraped, Aged and Didtressed Oak Flooring
Hardwood Flooring Installation and Consultancy Services

values.name: Naked Floors
